title: High ping
body: Just getting 300-400 ping for no reason I'm using optus anyone else? it's a pain

replies.body:
Hey Flipy

300 - 400 sounds a bit high.  A couple of questions:

 - Where (what city) are you playing from?
 - What is your normal ping to League?
 - What kind of internet connection do you have (Cable / ADSL)?
 - Do you connect your computer to the internet via a cable or via Wifi?

-Mindstar

Where (what city) are you playing from? Mackay
What is your normal ping to League? 36-40 
What kind of internet connection do you have (Cable / ADSL)? NBN
Do you connect your computer to the internet via a cable or via Wifi? WIFI

I haven't getting high pings recently, maybe it's just that day

I'm on Optus as well, and am also getting strangely abnormal ping. Seems to be limited to specific games, that is, most games will still have my normal ~60 ping, while some are sitting on ~200. I even tried reconnecting to a game once, and it improved the ping for the game.

It *might* be related to ports that Optus makes, but I'm more thinking it might be something at some point which is lowering the priority of our connections until they are refreshed. Is what I explained similar to what's happening to you?

Also, you might want to look over [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) in the meantime. Mainly, make sure there's no background applications open, and that automatic updates are all disabled.
